VOSONDash 0.4.2
  • Reference

Reference

Function Reference

Available functions and helpers

VOSONDash-package

Interface for collection and interactive analysis of social networks

Shiny App

runVOSONDash()

Run the VOSON Dashboard Shiny Application

Network Graphs

addAdditionalMeasures()

Add degree, in-degree, out-degree, betweenness and closeness measures to graph as vertex attributes

applyGraphFilters()

Filter out graph vertices and edges from graph object that are isolates, multi edge or edge loops

applyComponentFilter()

Filter out graph vertices not in component size range

applyCategoricalFilters()

Filter out graph vertices not in selected category sub-categories

applyPruneFilterX()

Filter out list of vertices from graphml object using vertex id value

getVertexCategories()

Get a list of vertex attribute names that match a category attribute prefix format

Text Analysis

mixmat()

Create a mixing matrix

wordCloudPlot()

Creates a Word Cloud plot

wordFreqChart()

Creates a Word Frequency chart

wordSentChart()

Creates a Sentiment Analysis chart

wordSentValenceChart()

Creates a Sentiment Analysis Valence chart

Social Media

getRedditUrlSubreddit()

Extract subreddit name from a reddit thread url

getRedditUrlThreadId()

Extract thread id from a reddit thread url

getYoutubeVideoId()

Extract youtube video id from url
